local.server
Interface Repository

All Known Subinterfaces:
AuthenticationService, LocationService
public interface Repository

Repository is the interface used to access to a generic repository.

A location service or AAA service are example of such repository.

Method Summary

          Adds a new user at the database.

Method Detail

sync

public void sync()
Syncronizes the database.

Can be used, for example, to save the current memory image of the DB.
